name: Soup de Journey: Slice, Chop, and Steer Your Way to Culinary Mastery
name_original: Soup de Journey: Slice, Chop, and Steer Your Way to Culinary Mastery
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49. Programming and game design by me, Andrew Tran; game design and 3d modeling by Kaelan Doyle Myerscough; title screen and 2d art by Nicole Ham.

In Soup de Journey: Slice, Chop, and Steer Your Way to Culinary Mastery, you are a famous chef who has taken to the water to bring his delicious soups to a whole archipelago! The problem: you have to steer your boat at the same time as you cook your soup! Can you steer your boat to its destination while preparing a delicious tomato soup?

Music from www.bensound.com
